isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO SERIES - INSTALL - COUNTERSHAFT ASSEMBLIES

svcproc.title: COUNTERSHAFT ASSEMBLIES
svcproc.para: Make sure the countershaft assemblies have been marked for proper position, 47-tooth PTO gear in the lower position.

On the drive gear of each countershaft assembly, mark the tooth aligned with the gear keyway and stamped with an "O" for easy identification. A highly visible color of toolmaker's dye is recommended for making timing marks.

step1.para: Mark the countershaft drive gear for timing purposes ( Figure 200).
Place the lower, 47-tooth PTO gear, assembly in the case, the inner bearing race end to the front ( Figure 201).
Position the countershaft assembly as far to the left as possible (the opposite side of the lower reverse idler gear assembly).
Place the upper, 45-tooth PTO gear, assembly in the case, the inner bearing race end to the front ( Figure 201).
Position the countershaft assembly as far to the right as possible (the same side as the lower reverse idler gear assembly).
